item.title: For the first time, Bernie Sanders calls Israel’s war in Gaza a genocide

item.title: Effort to censure Rep. Ilhan Omar over Charlie Kirk comments fails
item.description: The effort was part of a GOP campaign to punish individuals Republicans accuse of posthumously smearing Kirk.

item.title: U.S. wins release of Wells Fargo banker placed under exit ban in China
item.description: Beijing has allowed Mao Chenyue, a bank managing director in Atlanta, to return to the United States, people familiar with the matter said.
